title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1241.40 - Vehicle parking, unauthorized
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1241.40 - Vehicle parking, unauthorized

State Regulations
(a) Vehicles at a terminal shall be parked in
strict compliance with posted signs. (b) Vehicles parked in violation of posted
signs, in addition to other penalties, may be towed away and stored at the risk
and expense of the owner thereof. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1241.40

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
